summary: For Aries Ascendant, Saturn transiting the 12th house emphasizes closure, solitude, and disciplined inner work. Expenses, isolation, or behind-the-scenes responsibilities increase, urging careful planning and restraint. This phase favors structured withdrawal, spiritual discipline, and long-term preparation rather than outward expansion. When handled consciously, it clears karmic baggage and builds quiet strength for the next cycle.
